description: Sends a command to an Amazon QLDB ledger.

parameters.name: SessionToken
parameters.description: Specifies the session token for the current command. A session token is constant throughout the life of the session. To obtain a session token, run the StartSession command. This SessionToken is required for every subsequent command that is issued during the current session.

parameters.name: StartSession
parameters.description: Command to start a new session. A session token is obtained as part of the response. The name of the ledger to start a new session against.

nested_params.name: LedgerName
nested_params.description: The name of the ledger to start a new session against.

parameters.name: CommitTransaction
parameters.description: Command to commit the specified transaction. Specifies the transaction ID of the transaction to commit. Specifies the commit digest for the transaction to commit. For every active transaction, the commit digest must be passed. QLDB validates CommitDigest and rejects the commit with an error if the digest computed on the client does not match the digest computed by QLDB. The purpose of the CommitDigest parameter is to ensure that QLDB commits a transaction if and only if the server has processed the exact set of statements sent by the client, in the same order that client sent them, and with no duplicates.

nested_params.name: TransactionId
nested_params.description: Specifies the transaction ID of the transaction to commit.

nested_params.name: CommitDigest
nested_params.description: Specifies the commit digest for the transaction to commit. For every active transaction, the commit digest must be passed. QLDB validates CommitDigest and rejects the commit with an error if the digest computed on the client does not match the digest computed by QLDB. The purpose of the CommitDigest parameter is to ensure that QLDB commits a transaction if and only if the server has processed the exact set of statements sent by the client, in the same order that client sent them, and with no duplicates.

parameters.name: ExecuteStatement
parameters.description: Command to execute a statement in the specified transaction. Specifies the transaction ID of the request. Specifies the statement of the request. Parameters (list) --- Specifies the parameters for the parameterized statement in the request. (dict) --- A structure that can contain a value in multiple encoding formats. IonBinary (bytes) --- An Amazon Ion binary value contained in a ValueHolder structure. IonText (string) --- An Amazon Ion plaintext value contained in a ValueHolder structure.

nested_params.name: TransactionId
nested_params.description: Specifies the transaction ID of the request.

nested_params.name: Statement
nested_params.description: Specifies the statement of the request.

nested_params.name: Parameters
nested_params.description: Specifies the parameters for the parameterized statement in the request.

nested_params.name: IonBinary
nested_params.description: An Amazon Ion binary value contained in a ValueHolder structure.

nested_params.name: IonText
nested_params.description: An Amazon Ion plaintext value contained in a ValueHolder structure.

parameters.name: FetchPage
parameters.description: Command to fetch a page. Specifies the transaction ID of the page to be fetched. Specifies the next page token of the page to be fetched.

nested_params.name: TransactionId
nested_params.description: Specifies the transaction ID of the page to be fetched.

nested_params.name: NextPageToken
nested_params.description: Specifies the next page token of the page to be fetched.

nested_items.name: StartSession
nested_items.description: Contains the details of the started session that includes a session token. This SessionToken is required for every subsequent command that is issued during the current session.

nested_items.name: SessionToken
nested_items.description: Session token of the started session. This SessionToken is required for every subsequent command that is issued during the current session.

nested_items.name: TimingInformation
nested_items.description: Contains server-side performance information for the command.

nested_items.name: ProcessingTimeMilliseconds
nested_items.description: The amount of time that QLDB spent on processing the command, measured in milliseconds.

nested_items.name: StartTransaction
nested_items.description: Contains the details of the started transaction.

nested_items.name: TransactionId
nested_items.description: The transaction ID of the started transaction.

nested_items.name: TimingInformation
nested_items.description: Contains server-side performance information for the command.

nested_items.name: ProcessingTimeMilliseconds
nested_items.description: The amount of time that QLDB spent on processing the command, measured in milliseconds.

nested_items.name: EndSession
nested_items.description: Contains the details of the ended session.

nested_items.description: Contains server-side performance information for the command.

nested_items.name: ProcessingTimeMilliseconds
nested_items.description: The amount of time that QLDB spent on processing the command, measured in milliseconds.

nested_items.name: CommitTransaction
nested_items.description: Contains the details of the committed transaction.

nested_items.name: TransactionId
nested_items.description: The transaction ID of the committed transaction.

nested_items.name: CommitDigest
nested_items.description: The commit digest of the committed transaction.

nested_items.name: TimingInformation
nested_items.description: Contains server-side performance information for the command.

nested_items.name: ProcessingTimeMilliseconds
nested_items.description: The amount of time that QLDB spent on processing the command, measured in milliseconds.

nested_items.name: ConsumedIOs
nested_items.description: Contains metrics about the number of I/O requests that were consumed.

nested_items.name: ReadIOs
nested_items.description: The number of read I/O requests that the command made.

nested_items.name: WriteIOs
nested_items.description: The number of write I/O requests that the command made.

nested_items.name: AbortTransaction
nested_items.description: Contains the details of the aborted transaction.

nested_items.description: Contains server-side performance information for the command.

nested_items.name: FirstPage
nested_items.description: Contains the details of the first fetched page.
